response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value and potential impact, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is a significant discount compared to the market value of $10,000, aiming to make it more accessible to you while still allowing me to cover costs and ensure future investments in product development. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product. I look forward to potentially working with you.", "product_price": 9500}
